description:
What's the best way to play Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024 for peak performance? Is it better to download all the content or rely on streaming? I decided to put it to the test! In this video, I perform a comprehensive performance test to find out if having the content stored on your hard drive really makes a difference.

I ran a series of identical flights and tests using two separate installations: one with all scenery and assets downloaded, and another using only the streamed content.
